      Calculates the percentage of the map occupied by TypeHexagon.UNKNOW Then uses the setPercentExplored(float) to set the value to the percentage of unexplored hexagon in the map

    • Method Detail

      • getHexagon

        public Hexagon getHexagon(Coordinate position)
        Get the hexagon from the HashMap. If the hexagon isn't in the HashMap the method returns null.
        Parameters:
        position - Coordinate of the hexagon to search
        Returns:
        the hexagon at the right coordinate, and if not found : null

      • getHexagons

        public java.util.Collection<Hexagon> getHexagons()
        Return the whole map
        Returns:
        collection of Hexagon

      • isExplored

        public boolean isExplored()
        Tells if the map is completely explored or not
        Returns:
        boolean

        public float getPercentExploredFloat()

      • getPercentExploredInt

        public int getPercentExploredInt()

      • calculateUnknownMapPercentage

        public void calculateUnknownMapPercentage()

        Calculates the percentage of the map occupied by TypeHexagon.UNKNOW

        Then uses the setPercentExplored(float) to set the value to the percentage of unexplored hexagon in the map

      • calculateHexagonTypePercentage

        public void calculateHexagonTypePercentage()
        Calculates the occupation percentage (on the map) of each type of hexagon TypeHexagon.

      • calculateMapExplorationPercentage

        public void calculateMapExplorationPercentage()
        Launches percentages calculations (unknown/type)
